name: Close Call (Eerohne)
description:
HI SPY

OUR ENEMY, THE SOCIETY, IS GETTING STRONGER. THEIR NUMBER INCREASES DAY BY DAY. WE NEED TO STOP THEM BEFORE IT IS TO LATE.

YOUR MISSION: INFILTRATE THE SOCIETY AND STEAL THEIR DEAREST POSSESSION. BEWARE OF THEIR PATROL AND THEIR CHIEFS, AS THEY CAN KILL YOU.
I PLACED 10 TRAPS IN YOUR BAG. MANAGE THEM CAREFULLY.
YOUR TRAPS CAN EITHER STUN OR KILL. IF YOU STUN AN ENEMY YOU CAN COPY THEIR OUTFIT FOR 15 SECONDS AND OUTWIT THE PATROLS. I STILL RECOMMEND YOU TO BEWARE OF THE CHIEFS, AS THEY PROBABLY CAN SEE THROUGH YOUR DISGUISE.
IF YOU WANT TO DISTRACT THE ENEMY OR MAKE THEM FALL IN SOME TRAP, YOU CAN WHISTLE. BE CAREFUL TO NOT GET CAUGHT.

I WISH YOU GOOD LUCK IN YOUR ENDEAVOR... PLEASE COME BACK ALIVE.

Game by Eerohne and Logithss
